enchantment.life_steal_enchantment.life_: Steals health from enemies when dealing damage. Higher levels reduce the amount of damage needed to heal.
Applies a short Levivtation effect on hit.
enchantment.thunder_strike_enchantment.t: Landing a charged attack summons lightning on your target.
enchantment.double_hit_enchantment.doubl: Applies an extra hit with the same damage.
enchantment.cobweb_enchantment.cobweb.de: Places a cobweb onto the victim or target block.
enchantment.downfall_enchantment.downfal: Upon falling onto the ground, produces a damaging shockwave.
enchantment.burnless_enchantment.burnles: Reduces fire burn time. With a complete armor set, you become immune to burn.
Shield works like a Totem of Undying.
enchantment.spiky_enchantment.spiky.desc: Damage back to attackers when blocking.
enchantment.fangs_enchantment.fangs.desc: Summons evoker fangs when you take damage.
Increases step height. Move over blocks faster and smoother.
enchantment.air_jump_enchantment.air_jum: Allows you to jump once mid-air, while falling.
enchantment.path_speed_enchantment.path_: Allows you to run faster when stepping on dirt paths.
enchantment.magnetic_enchantment.magneti: Automatically picks up blocks and mob drops.
enchantment.vision_enchantment.vision.de: Grants the Night Vision effect while worn.
enchantment.soulbound_enchantment.soulbo: Returns enchanted item to your inventory upon death.
Prevents enchanted item from despawning or being destroyed.
